Job Title: Technical Operations and Software Platforms Co-op Employment Type: Co-op Student Location: North Vancouver Hours of Work: 7.5 hr Day Shift (5 days M-F), hybrid: min 2 days a week in office, 3 days remote Pay: $34.23 per hour, + 11.2% in lieu of vacation and stat Duration: 4 months with options to renew ICBC is searching for a motivated student who is intrigued by all things technical. Our co-op opportunity will provide practical, hands-on experience in one of the largest IT shops within British Columbia. This is your opportunity to gain exposure to complex enterprise level technology and software platforms. Our teams support over 650 applications from COTS ERP systems to home- grown specialty applications. Position highlights We have an opportunity for a Co-op with technical interests to join one of our Technical Operations or Software Platforms team and help support our clients across the province. This team supports a number of different infrastructures and software platforms. You will be in the centre of an operational department assisting in sustaining our platforms in support of business change.
